comments.creator: markh@mozilla.com
comments.author: markh@mozilla.com
comments.text:
To reproduce:

* Open the OWA panel and focus an element in the content.
* Click outside the panel - the panel hides.
* Re-open the OWA panel

The widget which previously had focus should be still have it - but it appears nothing has the focus.
comments.raw_text:
To reproduce:

* Open the OWA panel and focus an element in the content.
* Click outside the panel - the panel hides.
* Re-open the OWA panel

The widget which previously had focus should be still have it - but it appears nothing has the focus.

comments.text: Why is this invalid?  Users have been reporting this behaviour as a bug in Firefox Share - see bug 696987.  Seeing no reason was given, I'm reopening.
